info.title: DESCRIPTION
info.body: Konstrukt™ Trafficshield™ K-421 Floor Putty is a water-based cementitious epoxy compound designed to cover minor floor surface imperfections from 0.5mm to 2mm.

info.title: MATERIAL PREPARATION
info.body:
Mix K-421 Floor Putty Part B with K-421 Floor Putty Part A until homogenous.
Add K-421 Floor Putty Part C into the mixture and stir until homogenous.
Mixture can only be used within a 30-minute working time.
When intended to fill in cracks, use mixture immediately after mixing.
Allow 10-minute induction time when used as a putty.
Avoid the addition of water to mixture that has been to set.

info.title: SURFACE PREPARATION
info.body: Surface should be clean and dry, free from oil, grease, dirt, contaminants, and all loose grit and mortar. Thickness requirement for application is 0.5mm to 2 mm only.

info.title: APPLICATION SCHEDULE
info.body:
Apply the mixture onto the substrate by using a putty knife. 
Avoid the addition of water into mixture that has begun to set. It will weaken the properties of the product.
Allow product to cure for 1 day prior to the application of the desired system.
Product should be cured for at least 3 days prior to light traffic, 7 days prior for normal traffic.
When intended to fill cracks, use immediately after mixing. 
Allow 10 minutes induction time when used as a putty.
